record.dc:title: 260BN30 Lick Creek, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 14BN9 and 14BN10. 14BN9 - background, adult male. 14BN10 juvenile, same position as 14BN9. Both Stratum I, top. Bone (femur) of 14BN8 in center of picture. Square 52L3. Direction NW.
record.wpa:narrative: [14BN9] Adult male in good condition, fairly complete, skull crushed and partly plowed away. Extended burial on back, arms at sides, head oriented to SW. Best burial so far. [14BN10] Indeterminate juvenile(?) in good condition, fairly complete. Extended burial on back, arms at sides, head oriented to SW.
